parameters.description: Name of an Azure Resource group.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.description: The name of the automation account.
parameters.name: automationAccountName

parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation.
parameters.name: $filter

parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.description: Client Api Version.
parameters.name: api-version

schema.description: The response model for the list watcher operation.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets the next link.

value.description: Gets or sets a list of watchers.

allOf.description: The core properties of ARM resources

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource

allOf.description: The resource model definition for a ARM tracked top level resource

location.description: The Azure Region where the resource lives

etag.description: Gets or sets the etag of the resource.

properties.description: Gets or sets the watcher properties.

creationTime.description: Gets or sets the creation time.

executionFrequencyInSeconds.description: Gets or sets the frequency at which the watcher is invoked.

lastModifiedBy.description: Details of the user who last modified the watcher.

lastModifiedTime.description: Gets or sets the last modified time.

scriptName.description: Gets or sets the name of the script the watcher is attached to, i.e. the name of an existing runbook.

scriptParameters.description: Gets or sets the parameters of the script.

scriptRunOn.description: Gets or sets the name of the hybrid worker group the watcher will run on.

status.description: Gets the current status of the watcher.

default.description: Automation error response describing why the operation failed.

schema.description: Error response of an operation failure

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.
